resources.string:
To add another member to this Cabal, you need to provide them with a secret. You are about to display that secret as a QR code on your screen. To join, they should press the "Join Cabal" button, then scan the QR code you display.


Whoever sees this code will the ability to read all future communications in this Cabal, as well as potentially decrypt past captured communications. This includes people or recorders that are able to view your screen, potentially from a distance.


Would like to display your code and allow another person to join this Cabal?

Cabalī is currently not connected to any other devices, so it is unable to send messages.
\n\nWait until you have a connection, then try again.

Are you sure you want to send a self-destruct message for this Cabal?
\n\nThis will destroy and wipe this Cabal on your device, and also on any other devices this one connects to via the mesh. Requesting a Cabal to self destruct removes it from ALL devices, not just yours.
